p: Line 566-570, page 29, line 351-354, page 18, Table 6 and S3 Table: In the revised manuscript, we did not describe the minor variants analysis because much detail analysis on epidemiological findings was needed. In addition, we added the variant rate of oseltamivir-resistance tyrosine amino acid substitution at position 275 in NA gene of one oseltamivir- resistant Myanmar strain in “Drug resistant influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 virus” under results section. We added the internal genes of oseltamivir-resistant H275Y mutated virus.
